description: The oldest member of Koko`s crew and the second in command. A former Delta Force operator who used to be active in Somalia during the 1990s, he is a veteran mercenary with strong leadership skills. He acted as Floyd Hekmatyar`s bodyguard together with Chiquita, his ex-wife, before joining Koko`s squad. Lehm also does sniper work either alone or together with Lutz.
name: Lehm
